Text:
No problems here with Sophos AV (free version w/o support) on 2 Macs. Both work well (MBP 2008, MacPro 1,1 - 2007). I would recommend Sophos Antivirus to use at home. The prof. program cost money.

It's easy to install, and also easy to de-install. Much easier than Norton products with their hundred of files it is. Norton is crap, Sophos is ok for me.
I would not recommend anyone to d/l an anti-virus program from a torrent-site. Go directly to the Sophos home page and d/l from there.

Sophos is a world class anti virus it really is one of the best..please upload for windows if you can. Norton crap well maybe be a few years ago but 2010/11 is just about as good as it get's lite and sexy :-)
Just been of the Sophos website and their anti virus is for install on Mac and Windows!!..
